trans-unit.source: Provides a container for Windows toolbar objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Windows 工具列物件的容器。

trans-unit.source: ToolStrip is the base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStrip 是基底類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use ToolStrip and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ToolStrip 和其相關聯的類別，在新的 Windows Form 應用程式建立工具列包含 Windows XP、 Office、 Internet Explorer 中，或自訂外觀和行為，或沒有、 佈景主題與所有支援溢位和執行階段項目重新排列。

trans-unit.source: ToolStrip controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStrip 控制項也提供豐富的設計階段經驗，包括就地啟用，編輯、 自訂版面配置，以及共用指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>內的水平或垂直空間

trans-unit.source: The ToolStrip class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: ToolStrip 類別提供了許多管理繪製、 滑鼠和鍵盤輸入，以及拖放功能的成員。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all ToolStrip controls on a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager>類別，以取得更多的控制和自訂 Windows Form 上的所有 ToolStrip 控制項的繪製和版面配置樣式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: 下列項目專為緊密地與這兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>中所有方向。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the ToolStrip control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> You can join ToolStrip controls within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and merge ToolStrip controls with each other.
trans-unit.target: 它們可在設計階段的 ToolStrip 控制項的預設:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>您可以加入 ToolStrip 控制項內指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>及合併與每個其他的 ToolStrip 控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> rather than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>多重文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a ToolStrip does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，在 ToolStrip 不會參與定位順序除非絕對定位而非停駐或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> class to host any other Windows Forms control in a ToolStrip.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>類別來裝載任何其他 Windows Form 控制項中的 ToolStrip。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>

trans-unit.source: By default, the ToolStrip is double buffered, taking advantage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> setting.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ToolStrip 為雙重緩衝，利用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: Although ToolStrip replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 ToolStrip 取代，並將功能加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>的較舊的版本控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>如果您選擇保留以提供回溯相容性及未來使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> class with the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>s.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>具有指定的陣列類別<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>s。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop and item reordering are handled through events that you implement.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出拖放和項目重新排列是否透過您實作的事件處理。

trans-unit.source: Set the AllowDrop property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> property to `false` to respond to drag-and-drop behavior you have defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> events.
trans-unit.target: 將 AllowDrop 屬性設定為`true`並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>屬性`false`拖放行為，您已定義在回應<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set AllowDrop to `false` and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` to cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering automatically.
trans-unit.target: 設 AllowDrop`false`並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>至`true`造成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>類別處理拖放和項目的自動重新排列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` for two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects to allow dragging of items from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the other.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>至`true`兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>允許拖曳的項目從某個物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>另。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable the default drag-and-drop, the ALT key must be pressed during the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用預設拖放，必須在拖曳作業期間按下 ALT 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Setting both AllowDrop and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 設定這兩個 AllowDrop 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>至`true`擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否多個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>，並且可以結合其他類型。

trans-unit.source: Use the AllowMerge property to enable multiple-document interface (MDI) children to combine their respective menus in the MDI parent.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用結合其個別功能表的 MDI 父系中的多重文件介面 (MDI) 子系使用 AllowMerge 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is bound and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在容器的邊緣<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>繫結，並決定如何<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>隨其父代重新調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Use the Anchor property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 使用錨點屬性來定義如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 錨定在其父控制項的控制項，可確保，錨定的邊緣仍保留在相同位置相對於邊緣父控制項的父控制項調整大小。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Anchor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 錨點和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>屬性互斥。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.target: 只有一個可以設定一次，最後一個設定的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: If you set AutoSize to `false` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is embedded in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> panel, the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are not translated when you move the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a different panel of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 AutoSize 設`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>內嵌在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>面板中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>您將移<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>至不同的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>面板</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>時，不會轉譯</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>的範圍</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged> event, check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property, and resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 若要正確地解譯界限，同步處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged>事件，檢查值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>屬性，並調整大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>屬於映像處理的各個層面的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's AutoSize setting.
trans-unit.target: 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如下:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>及容器的自動調整設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If AutoSize is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -如果 AutoSize `true` （預設值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>

trans-unit.source: - If AutoSize is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -如果 AutoSize`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>，都沒有映像，也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>調整，就會發生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property is an ambient property.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same BackColor as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如下:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>設定和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（預設值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>，都沒有映像，也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>調整，就會發生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 判斷字元是否為項目可辨識的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: The IsInputChar method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 視窗訊息來判斷指定的輸入的字元是否應該前置處理過或直接傳送至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>前置處理期間會呼叫 IsInputChar 方法

trans-unit.source: If the IsInputChar method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsInputChar 方法傳回`true`，指定的字元會直接傳送給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果該方法會傳回`false`，字元會前置處理，並只傳送給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>如果它不由前置處理階段。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: 前置處理的字元包括檢查的字元是否另一個控制項的助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字元應直接傳送至的項目，而且不前置處理過。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>屬性設定會決定項目是否要出現在溢位區域一律，如有需要或永遠不會。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property in the LayoutCompleted event to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: 檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>屬性來判斷項目是否已放在主要 LayoutCompleted 萬一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，溢位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，或如果它目前未顯示根本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: 項目不會顯示原因的常見原因是，不適用項目上的主要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>屬性已設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the LayoutStyle property to one of the overflow values.

trans-unit.source: If the LayoutStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 LayoutStyle 屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>，將不會顯示調整大小底框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 處理命令按鍵。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，表示要處理的視窗訊息的參考所傳遞。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字元已由控制項處理否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 在處理對話方塊字元，例如索引標籤、 RETURN、 逸出及方向鍵前置處理的訊息稱為 ProcessDialogKey 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A>方法表示控制項未處理的索引鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey simply sends the character to the parent control's ProcessDialogKey method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: ProcessDialogKey 直接傳送至父控制項 ProcessDialogKey 方法，字元，或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Forms 應用程式或 ActiveX 控制項中裝載控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果金鑰已處理的控制項，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: The ProcessMnemonic method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: ProcessMnemonic 方法被呼叫要讓控制項有機會處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: This method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應該決定控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，以及指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法通常會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合控制項的文字中的助憶鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This default implementation of the ProcessMnemonic method simply returns `false`, to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: ProcessMnemonic 方法的預設實作只會傳回`false`，指出控制項是否有任何的助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字元當成助憶鍵處理的控制。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> used to customize the look and feel of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref>用於自訂的外觀與風格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the Renderer property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class to customize the look and feel of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> that does not have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Renderer 屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>類別來自訂外觀與風格，任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>沒有視窗控制代碼。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>

trans-unit.source: To do this, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, assign it to the Renderer property, and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，將它指派給 Renderer 屬性，並呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> used to customize the look and feel of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"> </xref>用於自訂的外觀與風格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer*>

trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates which visual styles will be applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出哪些視覺化樣式會套用至<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to indicate which set of visual styles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> will use.
